title: (x) "Earthfully Yours" casual script - Clarissa {Rainer}
content:
Have never seen this font before.

author: evan

comments.content: clarissa maybe? edit: posted at the same time as you. Thanks

You guys were faster than I was. Here’s the sample from the Script Guide.
